segments.text: Good afternoon , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to draw some money from my current account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much do you want to draw ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I want to draw out 4,000 yuan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK ! Do you take your bank card or bankbook with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Please fill out this form first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Do I need to sign my name here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . How do you want it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I want 1,000 yuan in traveler's checks and the rest in cash .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Here are the traveler's checks and money .
segments.speaker: S1
